model: Another great adventure with Faith McMann! Great characters and story! I couldn't put it down! Looking forward to reading more of these stories! Full of suspense and twists! Great job!
people: Another great adventure with action packed suspense! A wonderful and insightful reading. We have to think this type of evil really happens, but sadly thus is far to common!
